content: कूर्चः, --र्चं {@--1@} A bunch of any thing, a bundle. {@--2@} A handful of Kuśa grass. {@--3@} A peacock's feather {@--4@} The beard; आगतमनध्यायकारणं सिवेशषभूतमद्य जीर्णकूर्चानां <ls>U. 4</ls>; or पूरयितव्यमनेन चित्रफलकं लंबकूर्चानां तापसानां कदंबैः <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--5@} The tip of the thumb and the middle finger brought in contact so as to pinch &c. {@--6@} The upper part of the rose, the part (or hair) between the eye-brows. {@--7@} A brush. {@--8@} Deceit, fraud. {@--9@} Boasting, bragging. {@--10@} Hypocrisy. --र्चः {@--1@} The head. {@--2@} A store-room.

कूर्चः, --र्चं {@--1@} A bunch of any thing, a bundle. {@--2@} A handful of Kuśa grass. {@--3@} A peacock's feather {@--4@} The beard; आगतमनध्यायकारणं सिवेशषभूतमद्य जीर्णकूर्चानां <ls>U. 4</ls>; or पूरयितव्यमनेन चित्रफलकं लंबकूर्चानां तापसानां कदंबैः <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> {@--5@} The tip of the thumb and the middle finger brought in contact so as to pinch &c. {@--6@} The upper part of the rose, the part (or hair) between the eye-brows. {@--7@} A brush. {@--8@} Deceit, fraud. {@--9@} Boasting, bragging. {@--10@} Hypocrisy. --र्चः {@--1@} The head. {@--2@} A store-room.
